editor.cardOpacity: Controls how transparent the card background is. 0% = fully transparent, 100% = fully solid.
editor.cardBlur: Blur intensity for the frosted glass effect. Higher values create a stronger blur behind the card.
editor.customFont: Upload a .ttf or .woff2 font file to use your own brand typography.
editor.backgroundPatterns: Choose a decorative pattern for your page background. Each pattern adapts to your selected colors.

marketing.acceptOtherPrices: When enabled, advertisers can propose prices outside your min-max range. You can still reject any proposal.
marketing.priceRange: Set your minimum and maximum acceptable prices. This helps advertisers know your expectations.
marketing.platformFee: Portyo charges a 5% fee on all accepted proposals. This covers payment processing and platform maintenance.

analytics.googleAnalyticsId: Find your GA ID in Google Analytics → Admin → Data Streams → Your stream → Measurement ID (starts with G-).
analytics.facebookPixelId: Find your Pixel ID in Meta Events Manager → Data Sources → Your Pixel → Settings.
analytics.noIndex: When enabled, search engines like Google won't show your page in search results. Good for private pages.

seo.whatIsSeo: SEO helps your page appear in Google searches. Better SEO = more people finding you organically.
seo.metaTitle: The title shown in search results and browser tabs. Keep it under 60 characters for best results.
seo.metaDescription: A brief summary shown below your title in search results. Aim for 120-160 characters.
seo.ogImage: The image shown when your link is shared on social media. Recommended size: 1200x630 pixels.
seo.keywords: Words that help search engines understand your page content. Separate with commas.

products.digitalProduct: Digital products are delivered instantly via download link. Physical products require shipping.
products.stockQuantity: Leave empty for unlimited stock. Set a number to limit available units.

scheduler.availability: Define your working hours for each day. Clients can only book during these times.
scheduler.blockedDates: Block specific dates when you're unavailable (holidays, vacations, etc.).
scheduler.bufferTime: Time between appointments for breaks or preparation.

integrations.upgradeRequired: This integration requires a paid plan. Upgrade to unlock.
integrations.comingSoon: We're working on this integration. It will be available in a future update.
